title: 820-00165 No USB activity/No Boot
message:
Board had a tiny bit of corrosion on U3540, replaced that and now it gets stuck around 0.360A steady no loop.

VCORE 1.8V steady, no LIO flex or SMC bypass same thing.

Already tried:
Clean known good BIOS
Raballed CPU

PP3V3_SUS 3.3V
PLT_RESET_L present 3.3V
PLT_RST_BUF_L 3.3V
ALL_SYS_PWRGD 3.3V
PM_S0_PGOOD 3.4V

title: 820-00165 No USB activity/No Boot
message:
Check all SPI Bus Termination resistors and their traces.
Clean J6100, if needed.
Also check all resistors in the LPC lines, between SMC and PCH.
SMC_LRESET_L goes high?

title: 820-00165 No USB activity/No Boot
message:
SMC_LRESET_L 3.3V
Check all those resistors
Replaced SMC just in case, same result all around.

title: 820-00165 No USB activity/No Boot
message:
You may have bad CPU.
Or possible bad solders underneath.

title: 820-00165 No USB activity/No Boot
message: Ok some feedback, I reballed the CPU same problem, I have become proficient at doing this now, since that is the case and I have some of this boards here with shorted PCH or CPU I decided to do a CPU swap and same problem, so it is a bad CPU indeed, thanks a lot!
